title: A single site catalyst supported in mesoporous UiO-66 for catalytic conversion of carbon dioxide to formate
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,777-788
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01465G, Paper
Maureen Gumbo, Edward Ocansey, Banothile C. E. Makhubela, Francoise M. Amombo Noa, Lars Öhrström, Obieda S. Mudraj, Gift Mehlana
The half-sandwich (tetrazolylpyridyl)iridium(III) complex shows improved catalytic activity towards hydrogenation of carbon dioxide to formate when supported in a mesoporous m-UiO-66 MOF.
